task_1.description: Sort red and blue cups into two designated areas on the table.
task_1.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_2.description: Arrange cups in order of size (smallest to largest) in a line.
task_2.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_3.description: Pick up the cup that is not covered by any other object.
task_3.initial_setup: tissue is on top of the cup, paper cup is on the table

task_4.description: Place the marker next to the tissue so it's clearly visible.

task_5.description: Avoid picking up the green cup; instead, pick up the red cup.

task_6.description: Place the tissue in a position where it's not touching any other object.
task_6.initial_setup: tissue and cup are on the table

task_7.description: Stack the cups in a way that the smallest cup is on top.
task_7.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_8.description: Pick up the cup that is farthest from the marker.
task_8.initial_setup: cup and marker are on the table

task_9.description: Place the paper cup in a spot where it's not overlapping with the plastic cup.

task_10.description: Use the marker to indicate the location of the tissue.

task_11.description: Place the cup so that it's touching the edge of the table.

task_12.description: Pick up the cup that is not in the center of the table.

task_13.description: Arrange the cups in a triangle formation.
task_13.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_14.description: Place the tissue on top of the cup without causing it to tip over.

task_15.description: Select the cup that is closest to the marker and place it in the center.
task_15.initial_setup: cup and marker on the table

task_16.description: Avoid placing the tissue on top of the cup; instead, place it next to the cup.

task_17.description: Stack the cups so that the largest is at the bottom.
task_17.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_18.description: Use the marker to mark the position of the tissue.

task_19.description: Place the paper cup in a position where it's not directly under the plastic cup.

task_20.description: Pick up the cup that is not adjacent to any other object.
task_20.initial_setup: tissue and paper cup are on the table

task_21.description: Arrange the cups in a line with equal spacing between them.
task_21.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_22.description: Place the tissue in a spot where it's not overlapping with any other object.
task_22.initial_setup: tissue and cup are on the table

task_23.description: Select the cup that is the same color as the marker.
task_23.initial_setup: cup and marker on the table

task_24.description: Avoid placing the cup on top of the tissue; instead, place it next to the tissue.

task_25.description: Use the marker to indicate the correct position for the cup.
task_25.initial_setup: cup and marker on the table

task_26.description: Place the paper cup in a spot where it's not touching the edge of the table.

task_27.description: Pick up the cup that is not in the same row as the marker.
task_27.initial_setup: cup and marker on the table

task_28.description: Arrange the cups in a circle formation.
task_28.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_29.description: Place the tissue on the cup so that it's centered.

task_30.description: Select the cup that is the same size as the plastic cup.

task_31.description: Place the tissue in a position where it's not under any other object.
task_31.initial_setup: tissue and cup are on the table

task_32.description: Avoid picking up the cup that is partially obscured by the tissue.
task_32.initial_setup: tissue is on top of the cup

task_33.description: Stack the cups so that the middle cup is the smallest.
task_33.initial_setup: cups are scattered on the table

task_34.description: Place the marker in a spot where it's not near the tissue.

task_35.description: Select the cup that is not adjacent to the marker.
task_35.initial_setup: cup and marker on the table

task_36.description: Arrange the cups in a diagonal line from the top-left to bottom-right corner.
